value.title: StarCraft 2: RELENTLESS AGGRESSION! (ByuN vs Trap)
value.excerpt: Trap versus ByuN in a best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2. value.title: StarCraft 2: THE MID-GAME BUNKER "RUSH"! (PartinG vs Cure)
value.excerpt: A really fun series of professional StarCraft 2 between PartinG and Cure. In this best-of-3 we see a variety of openers from both players and in two of them, Cure goes for a timing attack where he's building structures like Bunkers on his opponent's side of the map. value.title: StarCraft 2: Nuke on Top of the Protoss Army? Yes Please! - Never attack to Grandmaster
value.excerpt: Welcome to the new Terran ladder series! This time, it's "Never Attack to Grandmaster!" In this challenge, I play as Terran on the EU ladder, and in every game I'm not allowed to attack with any units except for using Ghosts. I'm allowed to make any army units for defending, as long as I don't attack
